title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: You might have to show a colleague some tough love today. If they have trouble looking at a situation realistically, you may need to patiently illuminate reality for them. Theres likely to be some resistance on their part as iconoclastic Uranus opposes the stubborn Scorpio Sun in your 11th House of Friendship. But as long as you stay consistent and strive to be fair-minded, your message will eventually get through. John Lennon wrote, Being honest may not get you a lot of friends but itll always get you the right ones. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
